item.title: (GSoC) Pure-Go client for XRootD: Weeks 1 & 2
item.description: I am happy to announce that this summer I am working on the GSoC 2018 project titled “Pure-Go client for XRootD”. This project is a part of Go-HEP project which brings a set of libraries and applications for High Energy Physicists written in the Go programming language. XRootD is a protocol for access to the clustered data repositories and I am going to implement a client for that protocol and FUSE-based file system using that client.
